headline: Vail Resorts Heads Into Ski Season Backed by Strong Epic Pass Sales
summary: BAMCO trimmed its position in Vail Resorts as Epic Pass sales set up the winter season. Vail runs a large portfolio of destination resorts, and investors will be watching whether traffic and guest spending will support the company's earnings outlook.
